features: 🚘【Safe & Mini Dash Cam】Dash camera for cars recording FHD 1920X1080P/30 fps and 2K video with advanced GC CMOS + 170° wide angle + 6G lens, clearly capture the license plates and road signs during the day and night. Perfect mini dash camera for cars, truck, SUV, providing you with excellent visual evidence in case of an accident.

🚘【Free 64G SD Card&128G Max Support】Top rated dash camera with free high quality 64G SD card provided, Support Max 128G memory; Adopt H.265 encoding technology, saves 50% memory without compromising video quality.

🚘【Compact & Super Easy to Install】With slim and compact design (Size: 3.6x1.1x0.6inch), The mini hidden dash cam front takes up tiny space in your car, which won't obstruct your vision while driving. And simple installation and set up with excellent instructions included, no need to worry even for a first time user. With heat resistance chipset and adhesive pad, the car dash camera works fine and stays attached to windshield even on hot sun.

🚘【24 Hours Parking Mode】Mini USB hardwire kit(not included) is required for this function. Car dash cam will auto switch to parking mode while your car is parked. Collision detection can be triggered by impact or collision, and time lapse recording keeps recording continuously with low power consumption and low frame rate. If your vehicle is involved in a hit while parked, or someone attempts to steal your vehicle, car dash camera will provide around-the-clock protection.

🚘【Seamless Loop Recording & G-sensor】When the storage limit is reached on the memory card, new recordings will automatically overwrite oldest recordings. Triggered by G-sensor, it can automatically detect a sudden shake/collision and lock the footage to prevent the video from being overwrote even in loop recording.

🚘【Built-in WiFi & APP Control】RAINBOW HORSE Dash Camera comes with APP for Android or iOS smartphones to get a live stream, download videos, change settings, edit and share your footage simple. Footages can be shared easily to YouTube, Twitter, Facebook, or the social media platform with the tap of a finger, allowing you to share any journey with all of your friends.

🚘【Warranty & Support】Dash camera for cars must be powered by cigarette lighter port, so it comes with wires. Note: Wi-Fi doesn't mean wireless, only for connection between your phone and dash camera when you need to view videos by phone. The dash camera comes with a full 12 months warranty, if you have any question regarding your product, please do not hesitate to contact us via Amazon, after-sale service is 7/24 on standby.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: BUILT -IN MEMORY CARD A 64GB memory card is included in the package So you don't need to buy extra. Everything is ready for you! This dash cam pixels have 1080P and 2K to choice. You can choice it in your app.

WiFi Dash Cam--Smart App Warm Tip: The WiFi signal range of this dash camera is about 10FT, car dash cam will auto disconnected if out of range.How do I get the car dach cam card out? If you want to remove the SD card, you can't just pull it out. you can try to press the memory card into the first time, you will hear a crisp sound, and then release the finger, the memory card will be popped out.

Parking Monitor & 24 Hours Recording Parking Monitor: When the dash cam detects a collision happens, it will auto power on then record a protected video.24 Hours recording: the dashcam will go on recording after your car is parked. After you connect the dash cam to your fuse box via our dash cam hardwire kit, please make sure you have turned on the Time Lapse Recording or normal recording, otherwise it won't go on recording after you shut down your carBoth functions require continuous power and Hard Wire Kit (NOT included in package) 170° Wide-Angle Lens This car driving recorder employs 170° super wide angle lens. Ultra-wide field of view reduces the blind spots and captures more details, to reserve the real scene. Loop Recording The loop recording function makes the dash cam overwrite the oldest videos when the SD card is full, so the dash cam can achieve continues recording. You can set the video file length from 1,2,3 min by settings.

3 Inch Compact Dash Cam-- Easy Installation This is a compact, exquisite and powerful dash camera with 3Inch display, which won't obstruct your vision while driving. Also, the dash cam for cars is easily been mounted to your car’s windshield with the included suction cup and holder. Plug It and Start go.The voice broadcast function helps you know the current status of the dash camera. One example and most important one is letting you know if the impact reaches its set G-sensor level, the camera will lockes it, and saves in Emergency Locked Folder.

Front Camera Installation Attach to the windshield with a suction cup, with the help of included blue crowbar or cable clips , run wire of car charger inside weatherstrip and headliners and then plug into the cigarette lighter socket.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I love this cam!
reviews.reviewText: All in all great camera. The picture quality is amazing, it catches everything, and super easy to set up. It’s such an ease to operate which I love so much! This is a great dash cam!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I received my package so quickly and everything was intact. I got a 64gb memory card for storage. Package was as described by the seller

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Little camera with wide range and clear recordings
reviews.reviewText: I’m really liking this dash cam so far! It’s small and sleek so it doesn’t distract when on the dashboard. The image recorded is crisp, clear, smooth, and widescreen. It captures nearly the entire front window in a very clear image. I do wish that it had a battery so it didn’t always need to be plugged in, as the cable is a little bulky hanging off the dash. But I do like that it auto turns on when the car starts up, so I guess it’s a trade off. And you could always hardwire it to hide the wire better.I also wish the app was Bluetooth instead of WiFi as I don’t love connecting to generally unknown WiFi networks. But the good thing is that you only need to connect to modify settings or to review footage. It will turn on & record once powered, even if your phone isnt connected. It records right to the sd card (great that it’s included!) and can be reviewed either in your computer or via the app on WiFiWhile there are some changes I’d like, I’m still quite happy with this dash cam. My first test with it was a 5hr drive and it performed perfectly.I’ll be adding a suction Mount to it to make it more versatile. But very pleased and would recommend it to others.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Such a terrible product. This dash camera keeps shutting off no matter what I do. It tries to make some kind of spooky haunting noise when it shuts off.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Don't expect any support with this camera. You are on your own.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Power doesn’t work
reviews.reviewText: Power won’t work consistently, it cuts of every couple of minutes. It would be great if the power worked
